name: Shmatch
description:
How to play

Left and right arrow keys to move.

Z, X, or C to shoot.

What is SMATCH?

SHMATCH is a shoot-em-up and tile-matching game in one. It's like Space Invaders meets Tetris.

Be careful about spamming the shoot button, or you'll end up filling the screen with enemies.

Why did you make this game?

Made for Command Prompt Only Game Jam: Create a game that runs in a fictional command line. Limitation: A different type of combat.

FAQ

No one asked me.

Credits
  • Music made using Terry Cavanagh's amazingly free program, BOSCA CEOIL
  • Giant ASCII art for title screens was made using Patrick Gillespie's TAAG (Text to ASCII Art Generator)
